displayName.spanish: Alba del dios de los huesos

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti s trůnem.
description.english: You've collected a note in the throne area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone du trône.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich des Throns gesammelt.
description.hungarian: Megszerezted a jegyzetet a trón területén.
description.japanese: 「玉座」エリアのメモを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área do trono.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе трона.
description.schinese: 你在宝座区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona del trono.

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti radarové stanice.
description.english: You've collected a note in the radar station area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone de la station radar.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich der Radarstation gesammelt.
description.japanese: 「レーダー基地」エリアのメモを手に入れた

description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе радара.
description.schinese: 你在雷达基地收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona de la estación de radar.

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti jeskyně.
description.english: You've collected a note in the cave area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone de la grotte.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich der Höhle gesammelt.
description.japanese: 「洞窟」エリアのメモを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área da gruta.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе пещеры.
description.schinese: 你在洞穴区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona de la cueva.

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti vypáleného lesa.
description.english: You've collected a note in the burned forest area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone de la forêt brûlée.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich des verbrannten Walds gesammelt.
description.hungarian: Megszerezted a jegyzetet a leégett erdőnél.
description.japanese: 「燃える森」エリアのメモを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área da floresta queimada.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе сгоревшего леса.
description.schinese: 你在被烧毁的森林区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona quemada del bosque.

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti lesa.
description.english: You've collected a note in the tree area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone des arbres.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich der Bäume gesammelt.
description.hungarian: Megszerezted a jegyzetet a fás területen.
description.japanese: 「樹木」エリアのメモを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área da árvore.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе деревьев.
description.schinese: 你在怪树区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona de los árboles.

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti lovecké chaty.
description.english: You've collected a note in the hunters cabin area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone de la cabane de chasseurs.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich der Jagdhütte gesammelt.
description.japanese: 「狩猟小屋」エリアのメモを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área da cabana dos caçadores.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе охотничьего домика.
description.schinese: 你在猎人小屋区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona del refugio para cazadores.

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti s oltářem.
description.english: You've collected a note in the altar area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone de l'autel.

description.hungarian: Megszerezted a jegyzetet az oltár területén.

description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área do círculo.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе круга.
description.schinese: 你在圆环区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona del círculo.

displayName.english: In the name of the Father

description.czech: Našel jsi zápisky v oblasti kostela.
description.english: You've collected a note in the church area.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une note dans la zone de l'église.
description.german: Du hast einen Hinweis im Bereich der Kirche gesammelt.
description.japanese: 「教会」エリアのメモを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste uma nota na área da igreja.
description.russian: Вы нашли записку в районе церкви.
description.schinese: 你在教堂区域收集到一篇笔记
description.spanish: Has recogido una nota en la zona de la iglesia.

description.czech: Podařilo se ti dostat se ke stanu.
description.english: You've reached the tent.
description.french: Vous avez atteint la tente.
description.german: Du hast das Zelt erreicht.
description.japanese: テントに到達した
description.polish: Dotarcie do namiotu w ostatnim levelu.
description.portuguese: Chegaste à tenda.
description.schinese: 你来到了那个帐篷
description.spanish: Has llegado a la tienda.

description.czech: Setkal ses s anomálií.
description.english: You've encountered the anomaly.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré l'anomalie.
description.german: Du hast die Anomalie entdeckt.
description.japanese: アノマリーに遭遇した
description.portuguese: Encontraste a anomalia.
description.schinese: 你遇到了怪异现象
description.spanish: Te has topado con la anomalía.

displayName.portuguese: O fim de todas as coisas

description.czech: Podařilo se ti odemknout skutečný konec.
description.english: You've unlocked the real ending.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué la vraie fin.
description.german: Du hast das wahre Ende freigeschaltet.
description.japanese: 真のエンディングを見た
description.portuguese: Desbloqueaste o verdadeiro fim.
description.schinese: 你解锁了真结局
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado el final real.

description.czech: Prohrál jsi pronásledování.
description.english: You've lost the chase.
description.french: Vous avez perdu la poursuite.
description.german: Du hast das Rennen verloren.
description.japanese: 追跡を振り切った
description.portuguese: Perdeste a perseguição.
description.schinese: 你追逐失败了
description.spanish: Has perdido la caza.

description.czech: Našel jsi všechna hlášení.
description.english: You've collected all reports.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré tous les rapports.
description.german: Du hast alle Berichte gesammelt.
description.japanese: すべての報告書を手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste todos os relatórios.
description.schinese: 你收集到所有报告
description.spanish: Has recogido todos los informes.

description.czech: Našel jsi všechny články.
description.english: You've collected all articles.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré tous les articles.
description.german: Du hast alle Artikel gesammelt.
description.japanese: すべての記事を手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste todos os artigos.
description.schinese: 你收集到所有文章
description.spanish: Has recogido todos los artículos.

description.czech: Našel jsi všechny stránky deníku.
description.english: You've collected all journal pages.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré toutes les pages de journal.
description.german: Du hast alle Tagebuchseiten gesammelt.
description.japanese: すべての日記ページを手に入れた
description.portuguese: Recolheste todas as páginas do diário de bordo.
description.schinese: 你收集到所有日志页
description.spanish: Has recogido todas las páginas del diario.

description.czech: Prozkoumal jsi jeskyni.
description.english: You've explored the cave.
description.french: Vous avez exploré la grotte.
description.german: Du hast die Höhle erkundet.
description.japanese: 洞窟を探索した
description.portuguese: Exploraste a gruta.
description.schinese: 你探索了洞穴
description.spanish: Has explorado la cueva.

description.czech: Podařilo se ti odemknout incident v bunkru.
description.english: You've unlocked the incident in the bunker.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué l'incident dans le bunker.
description.german: Du hast den Vorfall im Bunker freigeschaltet.
description.japanese: バンカーでの出来事をアンロックした
description.portuguese: Desbloqueaste o incidente no abrigo subterrâneo.
description.schinese: 你解锁了地堡内的事件
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado el incidente del búnker.

description.czech: Podařilo se ti odemknout všechna útočiště.
description.english: You've unlocked all safe spots.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué tous les endroits sûrs.
description.german: Du hast alle sicheren Orte freigeschaltet.
description.japanese: すべての安全地帯をアンロックした
description.portuguese: Desbloqueaste todos os locais seguros.
description.schinese: 你解锁了所有安全屋
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los puertos seguros.

description.czech: Podařilo se ti přežít!
description.english: You've survived!
description.french: Vous avez survécu !
description.german: Du hast überlebt!
description.japanese: 生き残った！
description.portuguese: Sobreviveste!
description.schinese: 你活到了最后！
description.spanish: ¡Has sobrevivido!
